name: Light, Dark or Hrak?
description:
An ordinary quiet quiet evening in the village, village bustle, clean air, starry sky and your own household, nothing foreshadowed any surprises in this calm and quiet evening...

However, at some point, the village stability was interrupted by the flickering of light bulbs, the automatic machines were knocked out and power outages began in the entire village.

But our hero, the first guy in the village, was not at all confused when he came up with a brilliant plan to return stability to the village, as well as to get attention from local village beauties and respect among fellow villagers.

Taking the necessary arsenal from the garage, our hard worker goes to his farm where the most elite pig electrician named Boar hangs out and takes him with him to save the village from total immersion in darkness, sitting on an iron rural horse tractor and starting it, they went to search for malfunctions, dark night, rubber boots, pig eletrik, what could have gone wrong?

Light, Dark or Hrak - this is both a fun and scary atmospheric horror game where you have to test your nerves, stamina and dexterity in unexpected terrible obstacles that will undoubtedly stand in your way.

GREAT IMMENSE FOREST IS YOUR FRIEND AND ENEMY

It is so thick and large that you can easily get lost in it, however, this is what can save your life.

YOU ARE A SIMPLE PERSON

Remember this and do not forget that, like any person in a dangerous situation, you can put up a worthy resistance and not let yourself be defeated.

NIGHT IS NOT THE BEST TIME

When you are in a night unexplored forest, a flashlight will help you a lot, but not for long.

THE ELECTRIC PIG IS COUNTING ON YOU

He is completely defenseless against unknown threats, only you can protect and save him.

MORE IS STRONGER

If it doesn’t work out alone, you can always call for help 2-4 players who will provide indispensable help.
